酌.definition: to pour wine; to drink wine; to deliberate; to consider

酌予.definition: to give as one sees fit

酌情.definition: to use discretion; to take circumstances into account; to make allowances pertinent to a situation

酌情處理.definition: see 酌情辦理|酌情办理[zhuo2 qing2 ban4 li3]

酌情辦理.definition: to act after full consideration of the actual situation

酌收.definition: to charge different prices according to the situation; to collect (items) as appropriate

酌減.definition: to make considered reductions; discretionary reduction

酌滿.definition: to fill up (a wine glass) to the brim

酌獻.definition: to honor a deity with wine

酌辦.definition: to do as one thinks fit; to handle by taking circumstances into consideration

酌量.definition: to consider; to allow for; to use one's discretion; to measure (food and drink)
